Windlord:

"Denzabar" said Windlord while he wait Rattrap's answer"How do you 
feel?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> After quite some time Denzabar awakes, a door opens.  Denzabar 
walks out. 
> "System fully operational" A Comp. voice says. He speaks " I am 
fixed, fully 
> fixed" Said he, with joy in his voice. He tried to remember 
things, he still 
> remembered nothing but the past three days. "Well, I still can't 
remember anything, 
> but, This is a whole lot better than grunting." He looked around, 
looking for 
> someone.
